version.title: Package version
version.description: A semantic version string or range, such as [">=1.0.0", "<2.0.0"]

install-prerelease.title: Install Prerelease
install-prerelease.description: Opt in to prerelease versions of a package

package.title: Package identifier
package.description: Must be in format `org_name/package_name`. Refer to hub.getdbt.com for installation instructions

private.title: Package identifier
private.description: Must be in format `org_name/package_name`. Refer to docs.getdbt.com for installation instructions

revision.title: Revision
revision.description: Pin your package to a specific release by specifying a release name

subdirectory.title: Repo subdirectory
subdirectory.description: Subdirectory of the repo where the dbt package is located

revision.title: Revision
revision.description: Pin your package to a specific release by specifying a release name

subdirectory.title: Subdirectory
subdirectory.description: Only required if the package is nested in a subdirectory of the git project

warn-unpinned.title: Warn for Unpinned Revision
warn-unpinned.description: If set to false, dbt will not warn you if the package is not pinned to a specific version (e.g. a branch name)

name.description: dbt will create a subdirectory in your `packages-install-path` with this name, and the tarball's source code will be installed here.
